metadata.title: CVE-2020-36310 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.8. arch/x86/kvm/svm/svm.c allows a set_memory_region_test infinite loop for certain nested page faults, aka CID-e72436bc3a52.

criterions.comment: linux package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
